Available functionsÂ¶

The following functions are currently available for this version:

o load_templates()

o load_filters()

o fit_coeffs_from_file()

o fit_coeffs()

o reconstruct_maggies()

o reconstruct_maggies_from_files()

o fit_photoz_from_file()

o project_filters()

o fit_nonneg()
